document.full_text: brad mincey allowed one run in five innings of relief and east carolina beat st. john's 6-4 to advance to the championship of the charlottesville regional.
document.title: east carolina holds off st. john's 6-4
lines_and_colors: brad mincey allowed one run in five innings of relief and east carolina beat st. john's 6-4 to advance to the championship of the charlottesville regional.
